text: Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais (Pontifícia Universidade Católica de Minas Gerais, short PUC-MG) is an university of the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais. It was established in 1958. It is one of the five largest universities in Brazil. In 2010 it was nominated the best private university in Brazil by Best Universities. ==Related pages== *Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica de Minas Gerais *Minas Gerais *Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais ==References== ==Other websites== *Pontifícia Universidade Católica de Minas Gerais Category:Colleges and universities in Brazil Category:Minas Gerais Category:1958 establishments Category:1950s establishments in Brazil
title: Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais
